targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT "total" FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("used") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load1") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load15") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("blocked") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("zombies") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total_threads") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "usuario", mean(usage_system) as "sistema", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as usada, mean(cached) as cache, mean(free) as libre, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) as carga1,mean(load5) as carga5,mean(load15) as carga15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(running) as ejecucion, mean(blocked) as bloqueados, mean(sleeping) as durmiendo, mean(stopped) as parados, mean(zombies) as zombies, mean(paging) as paginacion, mean(unknown) as desconocido FROM "processes" WHERE host =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "usado", mean(free) as "libre" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "entrada"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "salida" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /$interface/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CERRADA, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CERRADA, mean(tcp_closing) as CERRADA, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLECIDA, mean(tcp_time_wait) as ESPERA FROM "netstat" WHERE host =~ /$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT "log" AS syslog FROM "syslog" WHERE  "host" =~ /$host$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=laboratory
list.label: Laboratorio
list.name: lab
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=laboratory

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE laboratory =~ /$lab/
list.label: Equipo
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE laboratory =~ /$lab/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$host/
list.label: Network Interface
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$host/
